s.text: Among the dissenters: Novak thinks cocaine use is "an irrelevant question in politics," and O'Beirne and Williams say it won't matter because Bush's lead is too strong.
Some say her probable New York senate campaign is a public exercise of marital therapy ( Capitol Gang's Kate O'Beirne and McLaughlin's Tony Blankley).
